Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People in Australia are showing concern over the minimum wage hike and impending super increase which are expected to hit small businesses hard. Meanwhile employees are being reminded of activities that may lead to their dismissal such as posting inappropriate content on social media and not disclosing their criminal history. Furthermore there is worry that rising interest rates in July may adversely affect homeowners and PropTrack modeling predicts the growth and decline of median home prices in every suburb in Melbourne over the next five years.
